attributes.action: Stop the mini-holland project and reverse all changes.
attributes.background: The mini- holland project is not wanted by residents in Waltham Forest. It is causing unnecessary congestion and delays. Local business are not benefiting and its a waste of money. Money which TFL can use to buy new trains etc

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of TfL who is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
